message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am pleased to offer you the chance to own this exceptional item at a special price of $1350000. This offer is tailored to reflect the significant worth the product holds for you, while also ensuring a fair transaction for me. I believe this price strikes a balance between our interests and presents a unique chance for you to secure an asset that could potentially appreciate in value over time. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.
